title: (x) War of the Worlds movie poster typeface. - Binderstyle or Report Bold {Florian via Mike F via Philippe}
content:
Hey, I'm trying to identify the typeface used in the movie poster (the tom cruise one) of War of the Worlds. I'm talking about the title, of course.

Thanks in advance to anyone that might help ;)

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [war\_of\_the\_worlds.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20141024022146/http:/typophile.com/files/war_of_the_worlds_0.jpg) | 55.65 KB |
author: er-minio

comments.content:
Ciao Emilio,

this [came up before](http://web.archive.org/web/20141024022146/http:/typophile.com/node/17269): It is Binderstyle (or Report Bold).  
F

Brilliant, thanks a lot Florian.

Ciao!
